faqs.question: Children
faqs.answer: While we love your children as much as you do, we have decided to limit the children attending. Those children invited have been detailed accordingly on the invitation.

faqs.question: Attire
answer: Cocktail. Please dress up with us on our big day!
The bride respectfully asks to be the only one in white.
The groom respectfully asks to be the only one in navy.

faqs.question: Transportation
faqs.answer: Please fill out the survey located in the RSVP to express interest in transportation services.

faqs.question: Accommodations
answer: We have a block of rooms available under “Baier-Gaylord Wedding”
At: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott
Approximately 15 minutes from the reception site and 30 minutes from the ceremony.

faqs.question: Can I bring a date?
faqs.answer: Our wedding is strictly RSVP only. We are only able to accommodate those who have been listed on invitations. Don’t worry! The dance floor will be full!

faqs.question: Dietary restrictions
faqs.answer: We will do our best to accommodate our loved ones.

faqs.question: Pandemic Guidelines
faqs.answer: There are currently no restrictrictions with our venue. However, we want everyone to feel safe! If wearing a mask makes you feel safest, we encourage you to do so!

faqs.question: Accessibility
faqs.answer: Both our reception and ceremony locations will be indoors and wheelchair accessible.

faqs.question: I still have questions. Who should I contact?
faqs.answer: We would love to answer your questions! At this time, many of your questions are still in the works. Please return back to this website as the date gets closer to additional information!
